typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Date as date,
		Open as double,
		High as double,
		Low as double,
		Close as double,
		Volume as double,
		Dividend as double,
		Split as double,
		Adj_Open as double,
		Adj_High as double,
		Adj_Low as double,
		Adj_Close as double,
		Adj_Volume as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> StocksSource
DerivedColumn1 window(over(stocksymbol),
	asc(Date, true),
	startRowOffset: -7L,
	endRowOffset: 7L,
	FifteenDayMovingAvg = round(avg(Close),2)) ~> Window1
Window1 select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Close,
		FifteenDayMovingAvg
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
StocksSource derive(stocksymbol = 'msft') ~> DerivedColumn1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
